translation.tagalog: Hello?
translation.english: Hello?

translation.tagalog: Good afternoon po.
translation.english: Good afternoon.

translation.tagalog: Hello, Pa.
translation.english: Hello, Dad.

translation.tagalog: Asan nandyan mo ba si Ma'am Jelina, si Sir Somalde Marcos?
translation.english: Is Ma'am Jelina or Sir Somalde Marcos there?

translation.tagalog: Pa, Pa.
translation.english: Dad, Dad.

translation.tagalog: Arigat mo ito sa kanyang Maya Banko, pwede ko ba siya makausap?
translation.english: This is regarding Maya Bank, may I speak with them?

translation.tagalog: Hello?
translation.english: Hello?

translation.tagalog: Hello po, Ma'am Jelina Somalde Marcos. Kaya na ho to, Ma'am?
translation.english: Hello Ma'am Jelina Somalde Marcos. Is this you, Ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Yes, Pa.
translation.english: Yes, sir.

translation.tagalog: Okay, Ma'am. By the way, Ma'am, this is Ivan po from AMG Collection, Ma'am, on behalf of Maya Bank, Ma'am, over the recorded line.
translation.english: Okay Ma'am. By the way, this is Ivan from AMG Collection, on behalf of Maya Bank, over the recorded line.

translation.tagalog: Okay, Pa.
translation.english: Okay.

translation.tagalog: Ma'am, for account security lang po, pa-confirm lang po muna ng last four-digit number na nakaregister po sa inyong Maya account.
translation.english: Ma'am, for account security, may I confirm the last four digits registered on your Maya account?

translation.tagalog: Okay.
translation.english: Okay.

translation.tagalog: Ito po bang 6305, Ma'am?
translation.english: Is it 6305, Ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Okay, we're done. I'm sorry. I have a 6305.
translation.english: Okay, we're done. I'm sorry. I have 6305.

translation.tagalog: Ma'am, upon checking po sa system namin, Ma'am, may unsettled balance ka pa po kay Maya Credit? Yes, Ma'am.
translation.english: Ma'am, upon checking our system, you still have an unsettled balance with Maya Credit. Is that correct, Ma'am?

translation.tagalog: I'm just, Pa.
translation.english: Yes, sir.

translation.tagalog: Ah, mounting up.
translation.english: Ma'am, I sent an email. When was that again, I believe I sent an email, right?

translation.tagalog: Pa, Pa, nag-email po ako. Kailan pa rin parang nag-email at ako, no?
translation.english: What did you email, Ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Ano pong in-email niya, Ma'am?
translation.english: When again? A day ago.

translation.tagalog: Kailan pa rin? Isang araw,
translation.english: Yes, Ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Yes, po.
translation.english: I emailed Maya for an extension. Yes, I sent an email for an extension.

translation.tagalog: nag-email po ako sa Maya na, ano, for extension. Hanggang, upo, nag-email ako for extension.
translation.english: Okay.

translation.tagalog: Oo po.
translation.english: You see, unfortunately, I lost my job.

translation.tagalog: You see, unfortunately po, I know, I lost my job.
translation.english: I understand, Ma'am. Just to explain, your account has already been transferred to a third-party collection agency. Maya is demanding settlement within the day. The amount is 7,563.63 pesos. It can be reloaned once fully settled, Ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Oo, ganun po, Ma'am. Ma'am, kasi po, ito, Ma'am, mapaliwanag ko lang po, Ma'am. Ah, yung account niyo po kasi, Ma'am, is na-transfer na po sa third-party collection agency po. So, dinidemand na po talaga siya ni Maya na makapagsettle po kayo within the day po. Since, ah, yung amount niyo naman po is 7,563.63 centavos po. Then, possible to relun naman po siya, Ma'am, once naisettle po siya ng full amount, Ma'am.
translation.english: I don't know. I don't know if I can cooperate.

translation.tagalog: I don't know. I don't know. I don't know if I can cooperate.
translation.english: Yes, Ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Oo po, Ma'am.
translation.english: I am cooperating. But maybe you could just add some notes. Because—

translation.tagalog: Nag-ikipag-cooperate naman ako. Pero, ano lang, siguro palagay na lang din siguro ng notes. Because,
translation.english: It really can't be settled yet.

translation.tagalog: Hindi po talaga may sisettle.
translation.english: I really can't handle the expenses.

translation.tagalog: hindi ko talaga kala rin yung experience.
translation.english: Okay, Ma'am. Let me inform you of the possible consequences, okay?

translation.tagalog: Oo po, Ma'am. Kasi, Ma'am, okay, Ma'am, ah, ano ko na lang kay Ma'am sa mga consequences, Ma'am, ha?
translation.english: Yes.

translation.tagalog: So, Pa.
translation.english: Just so you're aware, Ma'am. If it’s not settled, penalties and charges will accumulate. Also, your account might develop a bad or negative credit history. Once that happens, it may be transferred to the Credit Information Corporation.

translation.tagalog: Paratis aware lang kay Ma'am. Ah, possible kasi, Ma'am, kung hindi kay, ah, hindi po may sisettle.
translation.english: Yes, I know.

translation.tagalog: Pa.
translation.english: Once it’s transferred, your name or account might face difficulty with future loans.

translation.tagalog: Possible po na mag-accumulate po yung penalties and charges. Plus, ah, possible po yung account niyo is, ah, magkaroon na po ng bad credit or negative credit history, Ma'am. Ngayon, Ma'am, once na nagkaroon na po siya, Ma'am, possible matransfer na po siya sa CIC or Credit Information Corporation, Ma'am.
translation.english: Yes, I understand. I'm a student too.

translation.tagalog: а alam ko, ako,
translation.english: And again, penalties will still accumulate. I’ll just take down the notes, Ma'am, since you really can’t settle at this time.

translation.tagalog: Ngayon, once na transfer na po siya, Ma'am, possible po, ah, yung name niyo po or account niyo po is mahirapan na po sa mga future loans, po.
translation.english: Let’s just leave it at that. Thank you.

translation.tagalog: ayan din, andy cinnamon estudian.
translation.english: Alright, Ma'am. Thank you. Thank you.

translation.tagalog: And this one, this one. Then, mag-accumulate pa rin po penalties. Sige, Ma'am, may take-down notes ko na lang. Then, Ma'am, since kung wala po talaga, hindi po kaya talaga mag-settle.
translation.english: And this one, this one. Then, penalties will still accumulate, Ma'am. Alright, Ma'am, I'll just take down notes. Then, Ma'am, since if there really isn't any, it really can't be settled.

translation.english: We got lucky. On our right, heheheheheh, thank you.

translation.tagalog: Sige po, Ma'am. Thank you po. Thank you.
translation.english: Alright, Ma'am. Thank you, Ma'am. Thank you.
